s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT NO. 1 HOOD MOULDING PAD LH

atten4.ptxt: When installing the front No. 1 hood moulding pad, heat the front hood moulding surface using a heat light.

atten3.ptxt: Do not heat the front hood moulding excessively.

s2.ptxt: Clean the front hood moulding surface.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the front hood moulding surface.
Remove the double-sided tape from the front hood moulding surface.
Wipe off any tape adhesive residue with cleaner.

s2.ptxt: Install a new front No. 1 hood moulding pad.

s3.ptxt: Remove the peeling paper from the face of a new front No. 1 hood moulding pad.

atten4.ptxt: After removing the peeling paper, keep the exposed adhesive free from foreign matter.

s3.ptxt: Install the front No. 1 hood moulding pad.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT NO. 1 HOOD MOULDING PAD RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.
When installing the front hood moulding pad, heat the front hood moulding surface using a heat light.

atten3.ptxt: Do not heat the front hood moulding excessively.

s2.ptxt: Clean the front hood moulding surface.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the front hood moulding surface.
Remove the double-sided tape from the front hood moulding surface.
Wipe off any tape adhesive residue with cleaner.
Install a new front hood moulding pad.

item.ptxt: Remove the peeling paper from the face of a new front hood moulding pad.

atten4.ptxt: After removing the peeling paper, keep the exposed adhesive free from foreign matter.

item.ptxt: Install the front hood moulding pad.

s3.ptxt: Install a new front hood moulding pad.

item.ptxt: Remove the peeling paper from the face of a new front hood moulding pad.

atten4.ptxt: After removing the peeling paper, keep the exposed adhesive free from foreign matter.

item.ptxt: Install the front hood moulding pad.
